Eric National Mack (amụrụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, na ónyé na-akpụ ihe, nké bi na New York City.
A mụrụ Mack na Columbia, MD

Aha etiti ya bụ National, Mgbè National Gallery of Artī nke Washington DC gasịrị ebe nne na nna ya zutere. Mgbè ọ dị obérè, Mack rụrụ ọrụ màkà nnà ya na ụlọ ahịa uwe ya na-ere ahịa na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụdị ejiji na akwa dị iche iche. Ihe mkpuchi akwa Mack na-agụnyekarị ihe dịgasị iche iche dị ka blanket na-agagharị agagharị, bandanas, na akwa ndị ọzọ a chọtara ma ọ bụ nke sitere na mpaghara.

Na Jenụwarị 2019, Mack meghere na ngosi onwé ya na Brooklyn Museum nke akpọrọ: Lemme na-agafe n'ime ụlọ ahụ. Na-emeghe na Mee 2019, Mack ga-egosi na 2019 Whitney Biennial, nkè Rujeko Hockley na Jane Panetta haziri.
